name: Carol's Chicken Chili
author: ARLEMILLER
summary: Chicken breast, onion, chile peppers and beans make for great white chili sustenance! Here is a good recipe for those cold nights. Serve with some crusty French bread and a salad. Season to your own taste (some might like it spicier.)
ingredients: 6  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - chopped
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
2 (19 ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
¾ cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
directions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium high heat
Add chicken and onion and saute for 4 to 5 minutes
Stir in broth, chile peppers, garlic powder, cumin, oregano, cilantro and red pepper
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes
Stir in beans and simmer for 10 minutes; top with green onion and cheese and serve
